titulo: Call by video to your relatives in an easy, free and secure way | easyvideocall.me
descripcion: Video conference system based on a simplification of the Jitsi free software for people with difficulties to handle new technologies
tituloRRSS: Videocall your relatives in an easy, free and secure way
descripcionRRSS: Video conference system based on a simplification of the Jitsi free software, for people with difficulties to handle new technologies
portadaIntro: In this website page, you can create a virtual room where you can meet your relatives by video conference. The person with technological difficulties will be able to get into the room through an icon at the starting screen to avoid to have to type any number. How to prepare a smartphone or tablet?
portadaPaso1: Write a number of 9 digits that will identify your relatives room (we recommend to use 9 digits of a phone number easy to remember for your relatives):
portadaPaso2: The link to open your virtual room is:
portadaPaso2Copiar: Copy and share the link with the rest of your relatives to grant access to the virtual room from a Chrome browser or an Android smartphone.
portadaEntrarModoExperto: Access in expert mode (with all the buttons)
portadaCopiadoConExito: It is successfully copied at the clipboard:
portadaSalasVisitadas: Your have previously visited the following rooms from this device:
portadaNoEsNumeroValido: It is not a valid number. Try with a 9 digit number.
pieIntro: Service of TechPeopleCare designed by TEDECO (UPM) from the free and secure platform jitsi.
ayudaTitulo: How to prepare a smartphone or tablet for a person without digital background?
ayudaSubtitulo: The goal is that a person that is not used to new technologies to access a video call just by pushing four buttons.
ayudaBotonCorazon: Heart icon to access the app
ayudaBotonVerde: Green button to start the call
ayudaBotonRojo: Red button to hang up the call
ayudaBotonCirculo: State bar's 'Circle' to go to the starting screen
ayudaMinimo1: 1) Create an icon and place it in the center of the starting screen, delete the other icons or hide them
ayudaMinimo2: 2) Open the app for the first time to allow the use of the camera and microphone
ayudaRecomendacion1: Turn up the volume to the maximum
ayudaRecomendacion4: Hide from the starting screen all the apps that are not posible to uninstall
ayudaRecomendacion5: Deactivate the notifications of all the apps
ayudaRecomendacion7: Deactivate the PIN int the security options
ayudaRecomendacion8: Stablish an energy safety timing higher or equal to ten minutes
ayudaRecomendacion10: Set the icon of easyvideocall.me at the starting screen
llamadaAyudaTitulo: Follow these guideline to complete the preparation of the video call for the person that is not used to new technologies
legalPrivacidadSubtitulo1: 1. Who is responsible for the treatment of your data?
legalPrivacidadDato2: Origin IP and website from which you access (Referer)
legalPrivacidadDato3: Browser's Id that access our website (User Agent)
legalPrivacidadDato4: Your room id, and if you access in expert mode
legalPrivacidadSubtitulo3: 3. For what purpose do we process your data?
legalPrivacidadFin1: To generate statistics related to the use of the service
legalPrivacidadFin2: To satisfy the conservation rule of logs
legalPrivacidadFin3: To resolve troubleshooting in the service
legalPrivacidadSubtitulo4: 4. Addressee of assignments or data transfer
legalPrivacidad4p1: Due to the nature of the service, we use the meet.jit.si infrastructure, through its API, with the configuration optiondisableThirdPartyRequests not to use Google Analytics tracking options that otherwise are activated by default.
legalPrivacidad4p2: Once you get into the room, you are into their servers, whose privacy policy is https://jitsi.org/meet-jit-si-privacy/
legalPrivacidad4p3: The rest of libraries are loaded from our server, without using any CDNs or third partie servers
legalPrivacidad5p1: We use our own cookie where we store the identifiers of the rooms you have entered from that device, which serves both to be able to show them to you on the main page, and not to show you the instructions to configure the device every time you enter.
legalPrivacidad5p2: All the embedded videos are made with youtube-nocookie, so there is not tracking by third parties until the video is played.
legalPrivacidad5p3: We do not use any additional cookies, neither our own nor those of third parties.
